Keeps the ship upright and stable, allowing it to move effortlessly around Chaotic Whirlpools.

Reinforces the rudder to allow tighter turns at higher speeds.
Mines are no match for a tank of trained sharks.
Creates a smoke screen around your ship, blocking sight on a First Strike.
Allows the ship to burn nitro fuel, getting it to and from destinations quicker.  Reduces mission time by 50%.

A martial artist without peer who counters some |C00b3ffffBosses|R with hands and fists.

Manipulate the arcane to counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R with overwhelming power.

Counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R by freezing them in their tracks and shattering them with Frost magic.

A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush and counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
A deadly master of poisons who counters some |C00b3ffffBosses|R with vicious dagger strikes.
A versatile healer who can counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
Uses sinister Shadow magic, to counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.

Embraces the demon within to incinerate enemies and protect allies, countering some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
Allies of the Demon Hunters made up of Naga, Broken and even demons, the Outcast employ a variety of techniques to counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
An icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes to counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
A dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain themselves in the face of an enemy onslaught, countering some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
A master of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to counter some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
A master of the wild who can tame a wide variety of beasts to assist them in countering some |C00b3ffffBosses|R.
A master archer or sharpshooter who excels in countering some |C00b3ffffBosses|R from afar.
A rugged tracker who counters some |C00b3ffffBosses|R using animal venom, explosives and traps as deadly weapons.
